id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

authId.description: The related Firebase Authentication User ID

dateJoined.description: Date and time when the user joined.

paypalEmail.description: User's PayPal email address for payouts.

isAdmin.description: Indicates whether the user has admin privileges.

totalEarnings.description: The user's total accumulated earnings in INR.

totalBandwidthUsed.description: The total amount of bandwidth shared by the user in GB.

isSharing.description: Indicates if the user is currently sharing bandwidth.

referredBy.description: The referral code of the user who referred this user.

PayoutRequest.title: PayoutRequest
PayoutRequest.description: Represents a user's request for a payout.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PayoutRequest entity.

currency.description: The currency of the payout request (e.g., INR, USD).

payoutMethod.description: The payout method chosen by the user (e.g., UPI, PayPal).

status.description: The status of the payout request (e.g., pending, approved, rejected).

requestDate.description: Date and time when the payout request was made.

/users/{userId}/payoutRequests/{payoutRe.description: Stores payout requests for each user.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Indicates admin privileges for a user.
